mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY req_de DESC) rn FROM ( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crtf_req WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) - (ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY req_de DESC))+1 p_bo_no, req_no, TO_CHAR(req_de, 'YYYY.MM.DD') req_de, ROUND(TO_DATE(req_de) + 30 - SYSDATE) end_de, no_of_issue, issued_cnt, (SELECT com_code_nm FROM tb_com_code WHERE CODE_GRP = (SELECT CODE_GRP FROM TB_CODE_GRP WHERE CODE_GRP_NM = 'CRTF_KIND') AND com_code = crtf_kind) crtf_kind, crtf_req_resn FROM crtf_req WHERE stdnt_no = #{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) A ) ORDER BY req_no desc

mapper.select: SELECT a.name, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(a.regno1, 1,1) = 0 THEN 20 || a.regno1 ELSE 19 || a.regno1 END AS regno, c.sub_name, d.col_name, a.grade, a.stdnt_no, TO_CHAR(a.entsch_de, 'YYYY-MM-DD') entsch_de, TO_CHAR(b.req_de, 'YYYY-MM-DD') req_de, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM req_de) req_year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM req_de) req_month, EXTRACT(DAY FROM req_de) req_day, a.grdtn_de, a.reginfo_stat, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) year, b.req_no FROM V_STDNTINFO a INNER JOIN crtf_req b ON(a.stdnt_no=b.stdnt_no) INNER JOIN subject c ON(a.sub_code=c.sub_code) INNER JOIN college d ON(c.col_code=d.col_code) WHERE a.stdnt_no=#{stdnt_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.req_no=#{req_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
